question.text:
Match List-I with List-II:
$\begin{array}{|l|l|r|l|}\hline & \begin{array}{l} \text{List I} \\ \text{Location of Joint} \end{array} & & \begin{array}{l} \text{List II} \\ \text{Type of Joint} \end{array} \\ \hline A. & \begin{array}{l} \text{Joint between humerus and} \\ \text{pectoral girdle} \end{array} & I. & \text{Gliding joint} \\ \hline B. & \text{Knee joint} & II. & \text{Ball and Socket joint} \\ \hline C. & \text{Joint between atlas and axis} & III. & \text{Hinge joint} \\ \hline D & \text{Joint between carpals} & IV. & \text{Pivot joint} \\ \hline \end{array}$
Chose the correct answer from the option given below:

solution.text:
$\begin{array}{|l|l|l|l|}\hline & \begin{array}{l} \text{List I} \\ \text{Location of Joint} \end{array} & & \begin{array}{l} \text{List II} \\ \text{Type of Joint} \end{array} \\ \hline A. & \begin{array}{l} \text{Joint between humerus and} \\ \text{pectoral girdle} \end{array} & II. & \text{Ball and Socket joint} \\ \hline B. & \text{Knee joint} & III. & \text{Hinge joint} \\ \hline C. & \text{Joint between atlas and axis} & IV. & \text{Pivot joint} \\ \hline D & \text{Joint between carpals} & I. & \text{Gliding joint} \\ \hline \end{array}$
Thus, A-II, B-III, C-IV, D-I is the correct match.
